scripts.start: export LOCAL_IP_ADDRESS="localhost" PORT=3000 NODE_ENV="production" && env npm run server
scripts.test: export LOCAL_IP_ADDRESS="localhost" PORT=3000 NODE_ENV="development" DEBUG="express:*" && env npm run server
scripts.mstart: export LOCAL_IP_ADDRESS="localhost" PORT=3000 NODE_ENV="production" && env npm run mserver
scripts.mtest: export LOCAL_IP_ADDRESS="localhost" PORT=1234 NODE_ENV="development" DEBUG="express:*" && env npm run mserver
